name: InfluenzaTestsForInfluenzaBVirusAntigen
title: Influenza (Tests for influenza B virus Antigen)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for test names to detect Influenza B virus antigen),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify laboratory tests names),(Inclusion Criteria: Influenza virus B Ag),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
